113.content:
Your name is Brent Weller, age 27. You had short black hair, sapphire blue-light grey eyes and a fairly athletic build. You were a friendly and easygoing guy. You were also smart, adventurous and hedonistic. During your teenage years, you had a good understanding of how the stock market and economy worked. Thanks to this, and several smart investments, you made your first million by the time you were 18. You quickly became a highly-successful billionaire stockbroker. However, it wasn't long before your newfound wealth began attracting some unwanted attention, including your friends and family trying to take advantage of you, much to your irritation. Shortly after you turned 21, you eventually disappeared from public life and became a recluse. You were now living in a secluded, but luxurious villa on a remote private island located in the Caribbean.

You sat in a lounge chair on the beach, sipping on a strawberry daiquiri as you watched the sun set behind the ocean. You sighed heavily as you took another sip from your drink. While you were comfortable living on the island, you were starting to feel a bit lonely. After finishing your drink, you stood up and slipped on your bathrobe. You were just about to retreat back into the villa when suddenly,

1133.content:
You smiled happily as you enjoyed the view of your private beach on your private island. Sure, it got lonely every now and then, but that's the price you pay for peace and tranquility. Suddenly, you were shaken from your peaceful thoughts by the sight of a quick flash of light off in the distance. You tried to shake it off, but then you saw it again.

You sighed in frustration. Probably paparazzi or something, you thought as you pushed yourself to your feet to shoo away the intruders. You took the few short steps from your porch to the beachline, but as you got closer, your mouth dropped in shock at what you saw. The flashes of light were coming from the last few remnants of sunlight bouncing off an incredibly large metallic vehicle that was slowly rolling out of the sea onto your property!

You couldn't help but continue toward the awe inspiring piece of machinery. You had never seen anything like it, and you needed to get closer. As you drew closer, the vehicle stopped suddenly, but you continued your trek until you found yourself against what you assumed was a door. It, like the vehicle, was incredibly large. You hesitated for a moment, but lifted your hand and knocked.

The door suddenly clanged open, revealing a large creature shrouded in darkness on the inside. You were never the tallest person, but the figure inside the vehicle would tower over any professional athlete. Before you could get a word out, your world went dark as you found yourself unconscious.

Eventually, you slowly and lazily woke up. It felt like you were lying back on a metal table. Instead of opening your eyes you chose to focus on the sounds around you. Distinctly female voices disagreeing about something.

"I thought you said the island was uninhabited!" a commanding voice seethed.

"I....uh....well the scanners said it was!" a second voice meekly responded. "Maybe it picked up his small size and identified him as an animal? Or....maybe he's the only human on the island and the scanner just....missed him?" she searched for a rational explanation.

"Well, regardless, he'll have to stay with us now. Maybe he can give us some answers on the island and his planet while we await orders from headquarters," the commanding voice responded, still sounding irritated.

At the sound of having to stay, your body twitched.

"Hey! Quiet you two!" a third voice jumped in. "I think he's awake!"

Knowing that you were caught, you slowly opened your eyes. What you saw caused you to gasp. The women....if you could call them that....were definitely animals. But they all stood on two legs and had distinctly human features. They were all also incredibly tall and curvaceous. Your eyes slowly scanned the room and you saw a hippo, a kangaroo, a horse, and a rabbit surrounding your table. It was like you woke up in the most random startup zoo ever. You were filled with questions, but you were not the first to break the silence.

Who was?
1133.title: Curiosity...Well, You Know.

11331.content:
"He looks like he's in pretty good shape Captain," the hippo says.

"I'll say," the rabbit chimed in, licking her lips.

"Maybe so," the horse said in a commanding tone, "I'd still like you to give him an exam and make sure he's prepped for our journey Hela."

Your head was spinning as you tried to keep up with what was happening to you, but before you could get any words out you found yourself tossed over the hippo's shoulder and carried out.

"Wait! What's going on!?" you protest. "I'm Brent Weller, one of the richest men in the world! You can't treat me like this!"

Hela just chuckled until she tossed you onto a large medical table.

"Brent is it? I'm Hela, head of medical here on the ship. I'm going to give you a quick exam, but first you need to be treated if you're going to survive with us," she said with a smile.

"Now," she continued, "When was the last time you had something to eat or drink?" she asked, while digging through some drawers.

"I...uh...well, I was drinking a daiquiri just before I saw your..uh...ship," you answered stammering.

The hippo frowned. "That was just a few hours ago..." she said thoughtfully.

"Hours!?" you exclaimed. You had no idea you were out for that long!

"...and alcohol as well. Well, I guess we'll have to do the direct injection," she said with a shrug. "Eh, it's faster acting anyway."

She turned with a smile, brandishing an intimidatingly large syringe. You again tried to protest, but Hela's strength was too much for you as she jabbed you with the syringe. You screamed in pain before breathing in relief as she finally released you.

You felt your limbs get all wobbly before you finally regained your bearings. You looked up and gulped as you saw the hippo looking down on you with a smile.

"Now to test it. Catch me Brent!" she calls before turning and leaping at you.

Your eyes shot wide open as you saw Hela's massive ass careening toward you. You threw your hands up to protect yourself, but to no one's surprise it was hopeless. Her flesh was overwhelming and crushed you flat.

Hela's face alternated between a smile and a frown. "Well, no super strength I guess, but from what I can tell," she started with a shift of her hips, "Your form is perfectly malleable." The hippo smiled broadly as she felt your flattened form squish beneath her backside.

You were helpless beneath her, only to hope for mercy.

11332.content:
You spun around as you heard a voice from behind you say your name.

"How are you feelin' Brent?" The kangaroo asked with a smile. You have to look up to see it as her thick thighs fill your view as you turn to face her.

"I...well, I...wait!" You started to answer her, when you quickly realized that something was off. "How did you know my name?!" you asked in shock.

The anthro 'roo chuckled. "We were busy while you were napping Brent. Your earthly laws of physics wouldn't have done you many favors here with us, so we made some slight...ah...adjustments to your physiology. You'll find life with us much more survivable now," she said with a giggle.

"And we found your wallet while we were at it. Do all humans carry around so much green paper with pictures of other men?" the rabbit asked happily.

Well, at least that answers how they got your name, although it left many more worrying questions.

"Uhm, no. They don't," you answered shaking your head somewhat wearily. "And to answer your other question, I feel...well....fine. A little tired maybe, but fine."

"That's to be expected," the hippo says matter of factly, "A simple side effect," she says as if you had just taken Asprin.

While your head is still spinning with questions, the horse interjects.

"Alright, enough of the chit chat. Cara, take Brent to see his new quarters. The rest of you have some work to be doing, don't you?"

Most of the crew on the ship give some form of affirmative response and get busy, or start looking busy. Cara, apparently the kangaroo, is the only one hesitating.

"I'm sorry Captain, but...new quarters?" she asks.

The horse looks up and down the 'roo's body with a smile. You completely miss the look, but Cara does not, responding in kind with a smile of her own.

"Ah, right away Captain. This way Brent!" she calls to you, pulling you off the table and down the nearby hallway.

______

Cara holds you close to her body as she escorts you through the ship. You feel her thick, soft curves rub up against your much smaller body as she walks. You try to interject with questions about whatever they did to you while you were unconscious, but Cara simply ignores them and continues pointing out features of the ship. Finally, she stops in a long hallway in front of a tall doorway. It opens without the 'roo having to lift as much as a finger. She prods you through the open door and you see a lavishly decorated room. The door slams shut ominously immediately as the two of you walk through.

You looked around in confusion. Why would your new room be decorated already?

As if she was reading your mind, Cara smiles and answers your unasked question. "Welcome to my room Brent!" she says happily.

"Wait, your room? I thought you were showing me to my quarters?" you asked. Things on this boat never seem to follow logic as you would expect it.

"Oh, I am," Cara says as she slowly circles you. "I just thought we should be somewhere private first. You see, your quarters are right....here...." she says, drawing out her last two words as she rubs her belly.

"Wait....you're going to eat me!?" you ask in terror.

Cara looks at you in confusion, then down at her body, and then laughs. "Oh! No!" she exclaims with a laugh. "You're not going in here" she says patting her stomach, "You're going in here!" she says, pulling out the fleshy fold of the pouch that she was actually rubbing.

While you were relieved to know that you weren't about to be devoured, you weren't exactly relaxed.

"What?!" you exclaim, "I can't live in your....in your pouch!" you beg.

Cara just smiles and continues to circle you.

"Well, I do have other options if you'd prefer," she responds, patting her massive round ass. Your eyes shoot wide open once again. That option seems exponentially worse.

"That's OK Brent, you don't have to decide right away. I'm sure we can find some way to kill a little time..." she says, letting her words drift.

You sigh. Cara hasn't left you with much of a choice here. "Ok Cara," you relent, "The pouch it is," you say dejectedly.

The kangaroo jumped at you with a huge smile on her face. You tried to back away, but she was far too fast. She wrapped you up in her arms and held you tightly against her abundant chest.

"Oh, not just any pouch," Cara laughs, "I think you'll find my pouch to be quite...warm," she says, squeezing you with a loving caress. "Not just anybody gets to stay there you know," she says soothingly.

You try to respond, but your words are muffled to silence by her flesh. Cara continues.

"You'll be treated to a lot of...unique opportunities Brent," she says with a smile. "But you'll always come back to this one. I might never have a little Joey of my own, but I have a feeling that you'll feel the void quite nicely," she finishes.

Without another word, she silently peels her tight fleshy pocket from against her body and releases her hold on you, letting you fall into her pouch before letting it snap shut. You yelped as you fell, but swallowed your voice when you landed. You were surprised by how accurate Cara's prediction was. Her pouch was shockingly warm and cozy. It was a bit uncomfortably sticky, but despite that, you felt yourself wanting to curl up and take a nap. You felt Cara's hand happily massaging your back from the outside of her pouch, moaning in a sign that she was as comfortable as you are.

Your awed silence is interrupted by the tall, stacked horse-woman asking you a question.

"You, human. What did you hear?" she asks. It was more of a command than a question. Hers was the irritated, commanding voice you heard when you kept your eyes closed. You didn't have much time to gather a strategy, your mind was still spinning at the sight of these nude half animal half human women.

You realized from her expression that she wouldn't be patient for long, so you introduced yourself.

"I....ah...I'm Brent. I li...live on this island. I know you didn't expect to see me here....ah...." You hesitated, unsure that you wanted to bare everything.

"...and what else?" the kangaroo woman spoke up from behind you, her thick thighs moving dangerously close to your head. Immediately you realized your mistake. Your inability to leave was one of the last things they said, so by giving up that you heard anything at all, you made it clear you heard more than you were letting on!

With a sigh, you continued. "...and...and I know that you don't plan on letting me off this...well, whatever this is," you acknowledge.

The rabbit woman hops gleefully, making her breasts bounce and wobble.

"Easy Babs," the hippo chuckled, "I don't think he's as excited as we are that he'll be sticking around," the hippo laughed. The rabbit frowned at this realization.

The horse was still much more serious. "You are on an exploratory ship from the planet Jaha designed to cover any terrain. Hela," she said to the hippo, "The mask?"

Hela jumped to attention and pulled what looked like a gas mask out of her bag and quickly fastened it to your face. "Breathe deep Brent. Trust me, you'll need this," she said soothingly.

Without having much other option, you did as you were told. You felt a rush of adrenaline before your heartbeat quickly normalized and the mask was removed.

"Perfect," the horse woman said. "Now, " she continued, stradeling the table you were still lying on, holding herself just inches above your body. "Are there any other humans on this island?"

You swallowed hard at the sight of her looming pussy above you.

"N....no. I live here alone. I mean, I have a staff, but they won't be back until morning," you answered quickly.

"Perfect. That gives us all night," the horse woman responded. Turning to her companions, she smiled. "You're all dismissed," she said. As the rest of the crew left the room, she looked down on you with a smile.

"My name is Fiona. You'll hear me referred to as Captain. But you can call me mistress," she said with a smile before she lowered herself onto your face and slowly rocked her body side to side across your prone skin.

125.content:
You woke up with a strangled groan, jolting upright and instantly regretting it due to a pounding headache. Lying back down you also realized that your mouth felt like it was packed with cotton. Only after groaning again did you realize that you’re hot, extremely hot. Cracking your eyes open, you found that you couldn’t see much through billowing clouds. A brief moment of panic over a fire cooled off when you realized that it was steam not smoke drifting around you. Sitting up again, much more slowly this time, you were confused to see that you were in a room you didn’t recognize; gleaming metal everywhere, including the walls and the low platform you’re lying on. Several vents high on the walls were steadily pumping out the steam. Everything looked and felt damp from the moisture in the air and there was an acrid scent that clung to the back of your throat. The smell briefly stirred a memory of visiting your mother in the hospital. Pushing the memory aside with a shake of your head, you forced yourself to your feet, though with more than a few wobbly half-attempts.

As you did so, you noticed just how much of your pale flesh was exposed to the hot wet air, namely all of it. Years of yo-yo dieting left you on distinctly in the fat category with very large breasts sitting atop a weighty stomach that pooled against wide hips, and every inch of your body was completely uncovered. A sudden embarrassed flash made you try to retain some decency, but you could only be marginally successful at that, and it looked like you were completely alone anyways so you let your hands fall from your body. Thoughts of hidden cameras and whatnot briefly flitted through your mind, but you grudgingly shoved them aside.

Exploring the room turned up little else; no way to stop up the vents, no obvious signs of cameras or anything, no windows, and only the hint of a door: a rectangular patch of the wall slightly sunken in compared to the rest. There didn’t seem to be any way of opening the door either, no handle, knob, button, nor hole. Pounding on the door and shouting did nothing but bruise your hand and further aggravate your apparently sore throat. Returning to the “bed” platform on the floor, you sat down again, occasionally sweeping an arm through the steam to briefly dispel some of it from your face.

With nothing else to do, you turned your focus to how you ended up…wherever you were. Straining, you managed to remember you were walking home from work, taking a shortcut through the park with your apartment building just barely visible through the trees. Then came a bright light and a loud noise, and you could almost taste the fear you had at thinking you were about to be hit by a car jumping the curb or something. Then the next thing you remember was waking up here, no flashes of jumbled images, and no sensations of pain or anything. The fear from the possibility of a car hitting you made you shiver despite the heat, so you did your best to not dwell on that memory. Focusing outward, you found that the heat was uncomfortable but not as painful as it was when you first awoke, the real issue was the smell burning in your nose.

Time passed, though you couldn’t be sure how much with no sure way of telling time. You might have dozed several times, and you got up and paced around the room as another time wasting measure. Throughout it all you could feel the annoying aspect of how your long wavy hair clung to your head and body due to a combination of sweat and the airborne humidity. As you continued to sit and walk, you couldn’t stop thinking back to that supposed car accident since there was little else to think about. You toyed with the idea that you were in an accident and now you were in a hospital, though it didn’t look like any that you knew of. You also thought maybe you were laying in a coma or dreaming after being hit. The more you thought about it, the more you thought that the light hadn’t been in the right spot for headlights, and the sound wasn’t like the grumble of a motor or the screech of tires. Following those thoughts, you were left wondering just what had happened to you.

You lost your train of thought as a loud hiss caused you to nearly jump out of your skin, as did the sudden cool breeze that sent the steam whirling about. The “door” had opened, seemingly of its own accord. You crouched back, fearful of what might lie behind, especially since it was much brighter out there than the room you were in, making everything beyond bleached out and hard to see.

“Well come on, we don’t have all day. You’re finished in there, so get out here,” a voice suddenly called out in English. There was an unmistakable edge of annoyance to the voice, but there was also something odd about the accent, though you couldn’t quite place it.

Hesitantly, you moved a few steps closer to the door, and you could see a bit of the room behind, but not much.

“Don’t make me turn on the extractor. We really have to get going now, so get moving,” the voice called with even more annoyance easily evident.

Not wanting to find out what this “extractor” was, you moved out into the other room. The clouds of steam didn’t spread past the door and you shivered as soon as you stepped through, the chill quite evident in comparison to the “sauna” before. The light was enough to blind you, making you screw your eyes shut against the glare.

“Ah, that’s better. When you are finished making that ridiculous expression, please get into the pool,” the annoyance was mostly gone, but the odd accent was still in full effect.

Easing your eyes open, you had to blink a number of times before you could see anything. You started to ask what was going on, but the words froze in your throat as you saw who was speaking.
125.title: Getting steamed

1251.content:
You gaped in surprise at seeing a panda standing there, but not down on all fours as she should have been, she was standing upright with a humanesque body and looking at you as if expecting something from you.

She then only doubled up on the shock factor for you by saying, “By the divines, are you hard of hearing or something? Get in the pool.” She emphasized the command by enunciating and pointing with each word.

A portion of your mind connected the dots and found that she was the one speaking to you when you were in the other room; she had the same tone of annoyance and the same odd accent. Most of your mind was still stuck on the idea of a two legged panda woman, something like that couldn’t really exist…could it? Unaware of your mental lockup, the panda groaned and shook her head, with a look on her face that practically screamed “why do I have to deal with this?” Taking two quick steps closer, she pushed you roughly in the shoulder. In your stunned state, you couldn’t react in time so you ended up falling backwards into the pool that she kept telling you to get in. The water was cold, very cold after the steam bath, and more than enough to take your breath away as you tried to avoid drowning.

Coming to the surface, sputtering and thrashing about, you were dimly aware of the panda commanding “Hold still, hold still!”

It’s only after several more moments that you realized that she was cleaning you, or at least trying to. You somewhat simmered down, in more than a little disbelief at what was happening, though also in an attempt at not ticking her off, as she was obviously stronger than she appeared. Thinking back, you found that one of your first thoughts upon seeing this creature was “soft” and now getting so close to her, you found that your thought wasn’t far off: soft fur over an even softer body. She was covered in silky smooth black and white fur over a body that was decidedly plump, but far below your own weight, but carried it very well with quite a bit of confidence. She had to in order to wear something that looked like a jeweled bikini with most of the bikini portion removed, there was so little fabric between the small gemstones, and there wasn’t much coverage even counting the stones. You felt your face go red and tore your eyes away and only felt the blush deepen when you realized that you were still naked.

You tried to get away from her busy hands and cover yourself up, but she merely huffed and pulled you back into place and resumed her task without much effort. Shivers were soon setting in, further draining your energy past what the cold dunk had done. This, combined with your diminished mental faculties, made it so that you gave up resisting for now.

After a while, you managed to find your tongue again. You managed to stammer out, “Where am I?” between your chattering teeth.

While busy with washing your hair, she responded as if it was plainly obvious, “You’re in the capital city of the planet Jeskara.”

It took a bit for your cold addled mind to catch up with what she just told you. “Wait, I’m on another planet? I’m not on Earth!?” You started to pull away from her in shock again, but she once more repositioned you before dunking you to get the soap out of your hair. You surfaced, gasping for breath and blinking your eyes against the water steaming off of you.

Then as if she was speaking to a slow child, “Yes, you’re a long way from your birth world. Now please be quiet, we’re already running far enough behind schedule, and your frivolous questions aren’t helping.”

Any further attempts at figuring out what was going on were met only with stony silence so you soon gave up. After a while longer, she directed you out of the pool and quickly dried you off. The panda then handed you a bundle that you soon realized was clothing, looking somewhat vaguely like a jumpsuit and offering quite a bit more coverage than what the other was wearing. She pantomimed putting the clothes on so –still feeling more than a little embarrassed standing around naked – you started to slip it on. As the odd fabric slipped over your skin, you noticed how it seemed to instantly wick away the chill that still clung to you. You also noticed how the suit was shaped to accentuate your already eye-catching curves despite the extra coverage, almost as if to show you off.

You started to ask the panda about this, but she didn’t say a word. She instead looked you over briefly with those oddly red tinted eyes, gave a quick nod, and spun on her heel. She marched over to another door than the one leading to the steam room, and it opened automatically at her presence. Standing at the edge she looked back at you and gave a hurried “follow” gesture, before sashaying out. With seemingly your only hope for answers taking off, you hesitated for only a moment before following. As you passed through the door, you looked at the frame for just a split second before nearly getting caught as the door started to seal shut with you in the way. You managed to get through and stifled a grumble in your throat, thinking it best to not antagonize any more than you apparently already had.

Your “guide” wordlessly led you through hallways obviously richly decorated. There was plenty of art around, or at least you thought it was art since you could only recognize a few of things displayed about. Along the way, the two of you passed other “people” heading about business of their own, though each of them were humanoid animals just like the panda woman; you even saw a massive turtle man stomping along, sending tremors through the ground with each step. The windows along some of the walls showed you an unmistakably alien world that still felt somewhat familiar: a reddish sun hanging in the sky with hovering vehicles both big and large, all above a city that stretched beyond the limits of what you could see. So absorbed you were in gawking at everything about you that you nearly bumped into the plush rump of the panda when she stopped before you.

With another annoyed glance over her shoulder, she then turned forwards again. “Could you please go in and say that the cleansing has been finished?” she asked with much more respect towards what you could only think of as a futuristic knight, complete with sword hanging from his hip.

The leopard nodded his helmeted head before heading through a small door in the vast wall. A second “knight” remained standing before the wall, though this one was a falcon with an axe instead. You were wondering about where these two guards were standing, spread quite a ways from the door, till you realized that the door was set in a much larger door with a matching opposite, both towering far over you and looking like the entrance to a hanger or something. Only now did you realize how tall the hallways were that you had passed through before; What needs halls so big? your frightened mind managed to wonder.

Almost as if to try to answer, the doors started to open. It was actually more ominous that they did so soundlessly, no tremendous clang or earsplitting creak, nothing. The guard that went in before darted out through the still widening opening, taking his place again. Without looking over her shoulder this time, the panda gestured for you to follow, before sweeping through the door and into the room beyond.
1251.title: Chill out

12511.content:
A massive hall lined with tall pillars dotted along its length with a skylight running the whole length and giving a grand view of the sky while also allowing in plenty of that red light, making everything look it’s bathed in blood. It was more than enough to send a chill up your spin, and the twin rows of the guards standing beside the pillars didn’t help matters much either. That panda didn’t spare a glance for any of that, seemingly too used to being in here before. Instead she continued sweeping up the length of the chamber, leading you towards the far end. You, on the other hand, had your head on a swivel, looking back and forth, taking in as much as you could on the trip. The room was obviously made to hold a massive number of people, and it was just as obviously made to show off wealth even more so than the rest of the place that you had seen. The pillars were intricately carved, there’s banners hanging from each of the pillars, plenty more of the “art” along the walls, and the floor was polished to such a sheen that it almost as if you were walking on a giant mirror.

Yet again, you were so lost in ogling your surroundings that you didn’t notice the panda coming to a stop, and this time you really did run into her. This knocked her forward a step, before she turned around and glared with a growl in her throat.

A loud throat clearing caused the panda to freeze, before a new voice called out, “Sarah?”

The panda spun around quickly, but you managed to see a look of utter embarrassment tinged with fear. “Apologies, my lady, it won’t happen again. And as you requested, the newcomer has undergone cleansing.” She bowed low, her long hair falling about her face like a curtain.

You next turned your eyes to the one she was speaking to, and felt your mouth drop in shock. Several short steps combined to form a dais, and atop the platform was an enormous dragoness. She looked to be about eight feet tall, maybe a bit more, though it was hard to be sure since she was seated on a veritable pile of cushions. Being nearly as wide as she was tall, she formed a great blubbery mountain overlooking the room. She was “clothed” much like the panda, but with far more ornamentation, though her size also meant that far more of her body was left exposed. Atop her head was a jeweled circlet, though it was almost entirely hidden among the curls of her hair.

Plunging her hand into a bowl beside her, she brought out several things that looked a bit like apple sized blueberries and briefly played with them between her fingers. You weren’t even sure what they were, but the look of them was enough to cause your stomach to let out a small hungry grumble. She then deftly tossed them into the air and caught each of them in her razor lined maw. It was slightly unnerving how she performed this little show without taking her violet eyes off of you.

“So you are Vanessa Lawson, yes?” the dragoness said after staring at you for a rather uncomfortable stretch of time. Her voice had a similar accent to the panda, but was much more melodious in tone.

You managed to stammer out confirmation, still a bit stunned from everything that had happened recently. The dragoness gave a small hum before raising one of her massive flabby arms. Passing a hand over a jeweled bracelet encircling her vast wrist, a floating rectangle appeared before her, looking every bit like a computer screen without the computer or the screen. The dragoness continued to ask questions of you – confirming that your father died years ago and your mother much more recently, that you had no siblings or any other close relatives, that you had no significant other, and so on – confirming that you were indeed the correct Vanessa Lawson. Partway through the questioning, you realized that she must have been using your social media profiles and internet activities to check if it was you. You managed to find a break to ask about this, and the dragoness said that it was true, before muttering about how archaic human information systems where. Throughout everything, the panda – Sarah apparently – remained before you, standing still like a statue.

At the end of the interrogation, the dragoness smiled wide into her flabby cheeks as the floating screen vanished. “You did well, Sarah. She is indeed the one that I was seeking.” The panda responded to this praise by bowing low again and giving numerous thanks to the massive dragoness, with a wide smile of her own across her face, as well as an expression that was unmistakably relief.

Clearing your throat, you then tried to keep your voice steady and were even mostly successful, much to your own surprise. “May I ask why you have been ‘seeking’ me in particular?”

She smiled again, and there was something about that smile that sent another chill through your spine. “Yes, you may, and the answer is…”
12511.title: The big lady

choices: Sarah takes you to where you will be staying.
You follow the panda to the kitchens.
She leads you to the market in the city outside.
125111.content:
Those words echoed around the chamber, as well as your head. Did she really just say that I’m her property? you thought, before saying “Did you really just say that I’m your property? What do you mean by that?”

The dragoness furrowed her eyebrows, and glanced at Sarah before asking her “The humans do understand property, yes?” The panda nodded before the dragoness turned back to you, “I mean exactly that: you’re my property, I own you.” You couldn’t stop yourself, a nervous laugh escaped before you could stop it. “I’m not aware that I said something funny. Under our laws, we can take possession of someone who does not belong to someone else, whether through blood or marriage. I have had agents observing you for a time and was very pleased to find that you fit the qualifications.”

Fear continued to build in you as she spoke, there was no sign of this being a mean-spirited joke or anything, so it was sounding like she really did mean that you were supposed to be her property.

Fear made you speak up without thinking first, “But…you…can’t do this. I’m…I…I have a life. You can’t…just…enslave me!”

Sarah rounded on you, teeth bared, the muscles in her neck tensed, and eyebrows lowered. She then barked out, “How dare you! You presume to tell the queen what she can and cannot do in her own throne room!? She is the Mother of Nations, the Matriarch of the infinite ocean, she oversees nearly the entire galaxy, and she has more than the right to do this.”

The panda raised her hand as if to slap you but stopped instantly at the sound of the dragoness calling her name. She was then commanded to turn around and promptly did so, dropping her hand to her side again.

The dragoness tsked and shook her head. “Sarah, that outburst was uncalled for. We do have to give my newest acquisition some leeway; she is unaccustomed to how things are done beyond her small backwater planet.” Sarah hung her head in shame, begging forgiveness. “I will have to discipline you for this, you understand, yes?” The panda only nodded her head in agreement. “First, you will not be involved in my bathing till I say so again.” Sarah gulped loudly enough that you could hear it standing a few steps away. She also looked like she wanted to say something but buried it away. “Second, you will now be assigned to Vanessa. You will serve her for now, but you will also teach her of our ways. I expect you do well.”

The way she said that final line made you think that despite what this “queen” said it was less an expectation and more of an absolute command. The panda seemed as if she would like to protest but instead proceeded to say that she would unerringly fulfill the dragoness’ wishes.

The dragoness turned back to you. “And as for you…Why do you wish to return to your old life? Didn’t we just confirm that your life on Earth was insignificant and stagnant?” You didn’t say anything in response, but you did lower your eyes to avoid her haunting gaze hoping to avoid admitting that it was true. She continued on without your answer though, “But here you can see and do things that other humans could never experience. In addition, you are not being ‘enslaved’. Yes, you will be required to do as I ask, but you will also have more freedom than most humans even have on your homeworld, as well as live a comfortable life that many would yearn for.”

That did sound wonderful: a brand new start away from everything that you had known. And from the looks of things you had seen so far your life would indeed be comfortable beyond anything you had on Earth. And as for the part about having to do as she asked, that didn’t seem so different from having to do as your previous boss had told you to, except this dragoness seemed much more pleasant than that mean old hag. Now convinced, you nodded and agreed, and the dragoness – my queen now you mused – smiled wide before dismissing you and Sarah.

As the two of you left the throne room, a worrying through wormed into your head: it probably hadn’t mattered that you had agreed to it, you were already her property either way.
125111.title: Rise and fall

choices: Sarah gets a little closer than you were expecting.
The queen announces a trip and you’re coming along.

1251111.content:
The panda led you through the meandering halls again, till eventually you reached a set of doors that opened into where you would be living. You were expecting a cramped little room with barely enough space for you to move about in, certainly not the sprawling suite that looked more like a luxury apartment. Sarah was still apparently displeased with you because her exceedingly brief tour was icy at best, before she quickly left you alone saying she would return the next morning. You proceeded to explore a bit: first checking out the bedroom and walk-in closet – containing clothes somewhat like what you used to wear on earth all the way up to skimpy little things like Sarah and the queen wore and beyond. You found that there was a small but fully functional kitchenette included, and figured that anything more might be provided by a larger kitchen elsewhere in the massive palace. The thought of food made your belly grumble, but you held off for the moment wanting to finish exploring your new home. The bathroom was lavish and fully furnished, even if you couldn’t recognize all of the pieces in there. At the center was a sitting room looking out through floor to ceiling and wall to wall windows at a section of forest that almost looked like a park. A set of doors would admit you outside, but the sun was dipping low by now, so you turned away from the tranquil little scene.

Returning to the kitchenette, you found some food that was closer to what you had on earth and went with that over the more alien looking cuisine for now. Soon enough, you had a hot sandwich and a side of something that closely resembled potato chips along with a glass of what appeared to be milk of some sort. Not exactly high class fare, but it looked filling enough. The first bite blew your taste buds, flavors far beyond what you were expecting, practically making your tongue sing. Before you realized it, you had scarfed every last crumb down. You briefly thought about getting something else to eat, just to see if tasted just as wonderful, but decided against it. Instead, you wondered through to the bed, stripped off your outfit and slipped under the covers. The bed was much nicer than the lumpy bed you had before; it was so nice that you easily drifted off to sleep despite the oddity of being on a distant world surrounded by actual aliens.

–+–+–+–


It took time but you slowly started to get used to things with the Istu – what these aliens called themselves. Days blurred into weeks and beyond as you learned whatever you were taught, your body adjusting to the somewhat longer days and lighter gravity that Jeskara experienced. You learned about the vast interstellar civilization the Istu had built and some of the notable planets that they had developed including Jeskara, as well as more personal matters like how you should react and respond to the various people you might encounter in your new life, in addition to how to work the more basic forms of technology that were part of most Istu lives.

On the second day, you were concerned that Sarah would be icy or distant as she had been after the trouble in the throne room. Your worries proved unfounded when she came to you that morning as she had said: she was instead much more vibrant and cheerful towards you. You didn’t ask her about the change in personality towards you as you didn’t want to chance slipping back to how she had been the night before. The panda was a capable teacher, answering your questions and assisting you whenever needed. She also seemed to bear no ill will about now serving you, fulfilling your wishes with a smile. You kept your requests simple though – due to the simple matter of not wanting to antagonize her – mostly consisting of wanting food or new entertainment.

The food was just as wonderful, if not more so, than that first bit you had on the earliest night here. You started getting a bit more adventurous after playing it safe for the first week or so, adding in dishes and fare more common to Istu plates. The amazing tastes – as well as the novelty of so much new food – meant that you regularly ate more than what you really needed. This excess, combined with how rich the foods were, led to a rather inevitable result: you started gaining weight. It started out relatively slow, but quickly ramped up till you were gaining at least several pounds each day. You were dumbfounded at this outcome, and tried to restrain yourself. It worked, but only partially; you were still gaining weight but now at a somewhat slower place. You started making regular jaunts into the small patch of forest outside your rooms, jogging along the winding path through the trees and flowers.

That first day you found out that the forest was actually something like a greenhouse: a sealed section containing plants from Earth. “Something to help you settle in,” Sarah called it. You had no idea how they made it or the pleasant breeze that made the leaves move pleasantly throughout the enclosure. The material making up the transparent walls even filtered the sunlight somehow to make it look more like the earth’s sun, allowing you to almost believe that you had never left your homeworld though the illusion quickly broke down as you could see the alien city beyond.

The exercise further helped to stabilize your weight, but not completely, your body still slowly but surely packing on further fat to your already rounded frame. Loose clothing eventually turned tight, while already close-fitting garments grew increasingly ill fitting and overtaxed. Around the time that you had to ask for a third upsize for your outfits, you started getting the sensation that Sarah was looking you over more than usual. She never did it when you were looking her direction, but you could sporadically feel her eyes tracing your fleshy body whenever your back was turned. All of your attempts to ask her about this suspicion never left your throat, out of a desire not to stir things up anymore than you already had.

Your choice of clothing started to shift during this time, changing from nearly full body coverings to those that showed a bit of your pale skin. You didn’t feel confident enough to get into the scandalously revealing clothing yet, but you started to feel a bit better about showing off your body as well. You got the feeling that Sarah’s “secret” glances were going on a bit longer and probing deeper as you started down this path.

Queen Evangeline, as you were told her name eventually, took a decidedly hands-off approach with you. She was often busy with matters of state, and even when she wasn’t she already had a retinue of other servants for her needs. It seemed like she had you now, and that was mostly enough for her. She did occasionally call on you though, mostly to serve as the help for a feast or something. Each time you met someone new, you drew a number of shocked expressions and double takes, which probably wasn’t hard to understand, since most Istu had only heard of humans, never seeing one before especially in the flesh.

The lack of being called on meant that you had a lot of free time, which you mostly spent entertaining yourself and exploring the palace and city beyond. The wider population slowly grew used to your presence as you grew used to them. You still felt like an outsider though, only loosening up when you were with Sarah. The panda seemed to like your jokes almost as much as you liked telling them, though that was mostly just to hear her laugh. Three months after you had been taken away from your old life, the routine was finally broken.

12531.content:
Standing before you was a cow, but she was up on two legs with an obviously annoyed look on her face. You were instantly stunned by her appearance, though a portion of that was due to seeing an upright humanoid cow, more than a little of your shock had to do with everything else. She was fat, obviously so and just as obviously confident considering that she was wearing what you could only think of as a tiny bikini that left little to the imagination. Black and white fur covered her body, looking silky soft and shiny. A long braid of jet black fell from down her back to her waist, though a few loose locks hung around the curling horns and long ears that stuck out from her head. Her face had a stern expression, but was alluring as well with the full lips and deep green eyes. You couldn’t help but be drawn to her body though; her breasts were even larger than your own, and there were four of them pushing out far from her body. Similarly, her hips and thighs were wide and plush, wrapping about into a rump that looked like it would make any seat comfortable. Her stomach was not spared the extra weight either, but compared to the size of her assets above and below it was downright tiny giving her an excessively exaggerated hourglass figure.

It felt like you had been staring for an eternity, but it must have only been a moment. The cow gave a little growl in the back of her throat before taking two quick steps closer to you – causing her flesh to wiggle with each one – before planting her hand in your shoulder and shoving. You let out with a cry that was cut off as you plunged into water, most likely the pool that you had been told to get into. The water was cold, though that may have been just due to how warm you were from the steam room. It was still more than enough to set your teeth chattering and cause you to break out in goose pimples as you came back to the surface. The woman then squatted down beside the tub and pulled you closer. Without a word, she then set to cleaning you using a gel, the smell of which reminded you of the smell you had in the steam.

You tried numerous times to resist and get away, but the cow was easily able to put a stop to any attempt. There was a layer of muscle buried beneath her fat flesh, and her strength was obviously beyond what that layer might suggest.

After you had settled down, you became aware that the cow was muttering to herself, murmuring things like “I’m likely going to get punished for taking so long,” and “I hope this is appreciated enough.”

You recognized her voice; it was the one that called to you in the steam room.

Eventually you managed to find your own tongue and get it under control. Between your chattering teeth you asked, “What’s going on?”

The cow stopped, her face going a bit more lax as she leaned back and sighed. “Sorry, this is probably all more than a little odd to you.” You nodded, doing your best not to roll your eyes at the obviousness of that. “You just went through a deep decontamination cycle. It’s unlikely that you have anything that would be a probably, especially after the first cleansing on the ship when you were picked up—“

“Wait, ‘ship’, ‘picked up’? Was that the light and sound in the park…whenever that was?”

It was the cow’s turn to nod now, “Most likely. I heard there had to be a compromise between stealth and speed. Now can I please finish up, we’re already late enough as it is.”

You nodded meekly, letting her continue, not wanting to antagonize her any further. All of your attempts to get any more information about the situation were met with stony silence or variations of saying that would be revealed soon enough. Only after giving up on that clearly fruitless effort did you realize that you were still naked. You tried to pull away again and cover up, but the cow effortlessly brought you back into position in order to finish up. After using the gel in your hair, she scooped water over your head and rinsed it out, though the sudden chilly water left you sputtering for more than a short time. The cow then directed you out of the tub and helped you dry off before handing you a bundle of cloth. As you let it hang free you saw that it was clothing, though only just barely. To your eyes it was a sleeveless bodysuit and made of some smooth almost completely sheer material except for a few small more opaque patches placed to preserve some modesty. It was obviously made to show off nearly as much of your body as it could.

Voicing your reluctance to wear the “outfit” was met with a shrug by the cow, “That is what I was told for you to wear. If you don’t want to wear it, you can go as you are now.”

Faced with that alternative, you opted to wear the bodysuit. The suit easily stretched – handy considering how small it had seemed in your hands – and molded to your frame. The neckline plunged to expose much of your breasts, while the back rode up at the bottom to show off your rounded cheeks. You grimaced as you realized just how little of your body was actually hidden by the clothing; it almost felt like you were on display.

The cow looked you over before giving a brief nod of approval, though she did fuss with your hair a bit, arranging the crimson waves a bit better. Once satisfied, she took your hand and nearly dragged you along, leaving the sparse room behind and taking you out into the hallway beyond. After the Spartan décor of the rooms you left behind, you found the hallway to be still a bit plain but much more inviting. You finally got a view of the outside as the cow led you past a window, and what you saw outside stopped you in your tracks.

125311.content:
A picture perfect scene greeted you at the window: waves breaking on a sandy beach, a light wind rustling the trees dotted above the waterline, all with a sunny sky dotted with only a few puffy clouds. It was quite an idyllic view, but you couldn’t quite figure out where on Earth you were. You quickly noticed some signs that you likely weren’t on Earth though. For one thing, the water looked almost golden with purplish foam atop the waves and where they hit the sand. The sand itself wasn’t right either, being a dark blue rather than any of the usual colors of sand. Similarly unusual were the trees, they looked a bit like palm trees, but you had never heard of a tree having gray leaves like that or trees having what looked like a bush sprouting about halfway down the trunk.

“I’m not on Earth any more, am I?” you asked more than a little numb with the realization.

“No, you are not,” the cow responded plainly and letting that hang in the air

She then grabbed your arm and pulled you along again without another word, obviously in a rush to get wherever the two of you were supposed to go. Along the way, you heard snippets of conversations behind closed doors or down other hallways, but couldn’t hear enough to make sense of whatever was being said.

Several minutes later, the cow brought you through another door, this time leading outside. You found yourself on a patio overlooking the beach just a short distance beyond. The furniture dotted around was recognizable if not quite totally familiar. The cow stopped only briefly, glancing about before pulling you towards one of the seats closest to the sand. A large umbrella – made to let some but not all of the sun’s light through – shaded the seat. The seat was large enough that you could tell that someone was sitting in it, but not who or what they were. A few paces from the seat, the cow motioned for you to stay there before taking the last couple of steps on her own.

“I have brought the human as you requested,” she said respectfully, bowing so low that her breasts nearly slipped from the cups of her top.

There was a murmur of confirmation before the chair squeaked and the occupant stood up, granting you the first view of them.

The first thought you had as the dragoness stepped out around her seat and closer to you was Wow, she’s tall. I’m sure that you have many questions. Please, take a seat,” sweeping an arm out to indicate a pair of seats sitting a short distance away. "Looks like you found us a boyfriend." Tammy says while eyeing you up. "What?!" you exclaim, looking from one cat to the next. Rita leans in close and gives you a smirk. "So you can talk huh?" she asks while rubbing your cheek. You suddenly feel yourself being fondled and notice that the big paws holding onto you are moving up and down your body. Looking up you see Riley blushing under her fur. "Geez, wait a little longer Riley." Tammy says jokingly. "Sorry..." the huge tiger says quietly. Rita stands up straight and starts walking away. "Alright, let's get out of here. We'll explain everything on the ship." she says. Riley slings you over her shoulder and the three of them walk away.

When Riley stops walking you look up to see an honest to God spaceship. When the door opens the three women enter with you in tow. You see that you're in what looks like the control room. All of them sit down and buckle their seatbelts. Riley does so with you still in her lap, securing you against her large soft body. Rita starts managing the controls while Tammy chuckles at Riley's obvious enjoyment at having you close to her. You feel the ship rumble and then lift off of the ground. There's a feeling of pressure for a minute and then its gone. The girls all unfasten their seatbelts and Rita turns to you. "I guess I should explain." she says.

"As you can see, we're not from your planet." Rita says. "We actually live on this ship and travel all over the universe." Tammy turns to you as well. "It was great when we formed the travel group but eventually we realized we were...bored." she says. "So we decided to find a communal boyfriend to have some fun with." Tammy says. Riley hugs you tighter and smiles. "Yes..." she says. "We decided to pick you after watching you for a while. It looks like we won't cause a fuss by taking you and you seem easy to control." Rita finishes. So in a nutshell, you're now the shared boyfriend of some space colony. What next?

The girls all get up to stretch after takeoff. Riley is a bit reluctant but she releases her hold on you and lets you up. "Alright, time to relax." Tammy says. "It should be a while until we arrive," Rita says. "Your planet is pretty out of the way after all." You look from one girl to the next and then survey the room, not knowing what to do. "Oh, how about a little tour?" Tammy asks. Before you can answer she grabs you by the arm and hauls you off. Riley watches you go disappointed while Rita rolls her eyes with a smile.

You marvel at the size of the ship's interior as the panthress drags you around. "Pretty impressive huh?" she asks. It sure is. This place is pretty much like a hotel. So far she's showed you a library, a gym, and lots of other rooms. "We have plenty of ways to pass the time for long trips." Tammy says. "The trip we're on now will take at least several days.". Wow, you're really headed far from home.

Eventually during your tour Tammy leads you to the bedrooms. The hallway here is lined with rooms. "We have a lot just in case we have a big group on board." Tammy explains. She opens one of the doors and leads you inside. "You'll be staying here." she says. You look around and see how nice it is. "You get the place to yourself for now. I'd love to share a room with you, but Rita says we should let you take everything in first." She looks a little annoyed at this. "Unless you want to get a little closer right now?" she asks. Just then the door opens and Riley is standing right behind you. The massive tigress grabs you before you or Tammy can react and carries you off. But to where?

13533.content:
You're not sure what she means by 'guest', and even less sure that you wanna find out. You squirm and writhe in the tigress' grip in an attempt to break free. However, she simply holds you tighter to prevent your escape.

"My, he's a feisty one," Riley noted as you thrashed about in her grip like a fish fighting a hook in its mouth.

"Let me go!" You shout as you try to power step your way out of Riley's arms.

"Calm down, your gonna hurt yourself" Riley warned.

"What do you want from me?" You demanded as you were drawn into a reverse bear hug.

Tammy then walked over and knelt down just in front of you to get a better look at you, "All we want is to get to know you better" she stated. Her voice was very calming and much higher pitched than the other two.

"Y-you swear that's all you want?" You ask as you slowly force you breathing to slow and relax your muscles.

"Yes" Tammy replied with a gentle nod.

"O-okay, what do you want to know?" You ask as you look between Tammy and Rita.

"I'm afraid it's not that simple," Rita interjected, "You see, we've been traveling together for a long time and we figure it's time to spice things up a bit, as you humans say."

"I don't follow," you reply as you feel Riley's grip start to loosen.

"We feel it's time to make room in our group for a new person. Someone who can really appreciate traveling with us and change our lifestyle a bit... A new element that'll change what we do and how we do it" Rita explained.

"And you think a human will do that for you?" You ask nervously.

"Most of you haven't been in space before, your easy to take care of and you're cute. It'd be interesting to travel with a human" Riley replied.

"Wait a minute, you want me?!" You exclaim, you'd been sucpiscious for a while now but you weren't expecting anything like this.

"A little slow on the uptake, huh kid?" Rita chuckled, "The fact is we've been watching a number of humans for a while now and you're the number one candidate, congrats."

"But I can't just leave!" You exclaim, "People will miss me, I have a life here!"

"Unfortunately our decision is final, you must come with us now that you've seen and interacted with us" Tammy replied, it seemed that while they all wanted you to join, she was the most remorseful about taking you away from your current life.

You were shocked, you understood what was happening but you just weren't sure how to react, Riley's grip was almost non-existent, you might be able to make a break for it. On the other hand, you are being offered an incredible opportunity.... And who knows how these aliens will react if you try to run? What should you do?

135332.content:
You stayed quiet for awhile before Rita spoke up, "Okay," she sighed straightening up, "suppose we let you go. What are you going back to? You say you have family, but you only have you're mother and she isn't exactly the brightest star in your sky, and you've no ideas where your father is do you?"

You stared at her in disbelief, how could she know that? How long had they been watching you? "How long ha-" You were abruptly silenced as Riley covered your mouth with her paw.

"I wasn't finished" Rita replied as she paced around a bit, "You also lack any real friends, you have a few acquaintances... But that's all they are. They don't check up on you or think about you. They never call out of concern or regard for you, it's strictly business." You didn't want to admit it but she was right, there was virtually nobody who cared about you, if you dissappeared they would ask questions, sure, but you sincerely doubt that they'd start a manhunt just to make sure you were ok.

"Even if we did leave you here," Riley broke in, "The government will be here within the hour. You're within one of your miles of our ship. They'll know where you've been and want to lock you up and interrogate you."

This was also true, chances are that someone or something somewhere has a record or picture of you being so close to their landing site. You might as well be E.T. At this point, because the Feds would be on you like white on rice. Besides, this could be the change you were looking for, and even if it wasn't, they said themselves that they weren't going to let you go, and you doubt you could escape them even if you really and/or still wanted to. At length you sigh and decide you should just go willingly.

"You win, I'll come with you," you sigh with a shrug. The three cats looked at each other gleefully.

"We promise we'll take really good care of you!" Rita exclaimed.

"You won't regret this! You'll have tons of fun!" Riley beamed.

"Thank you for coming willingly and giving us a chance" Tammy smiled.

They talk as if you were actually given a choice. Guess they really appreciated the fact that you wanted to go versus them forcing you. Before you could give anymore thought to what was happening, Riley slung you over her shoulder and all three furries began making their way through the woods, presumably too their ship. You get a brief glimpse of an entryway before your world blurs as you're handed off to one of the other two girls. When everything comes back into focus you find yourself sitting in Tammy's lap at some sort of control station. Before you can move or say anything, she fastens a seat belt over both of you, in effect strapping you to her own body. It was rather comfortable for the most part, but kind of weird. You glance up at her questioning lay as she returns your glance with an apologetic smile.

"Sorry, we're in a hurry and we don't really have any chairs that you'll fit in yet," She explains, "So for now, when we leave and land on different planets, you'll have to sit with one of us." She said she was sorry but her face didn't really match her words, her expression looked more like guilty pleasure to you. But you let it pass and watch as she reaches around you to operate the controls.

The three felines start shouting technological space and code phrases to each other, you assume it's a preflight check. Before long though it gets quiet and the ship start to shudder and the sound of rocket engines fills the air and resonates through your bones. You look up and find an oval shaped window just above the work station, you watch as the faint outline of trees surrounding the ship fall away from the window. You feel your body being pressed into Tammy's although she doesn't seem to mind, you feel slightly uncomfortable being so close to someone you just me, especially when they're not even human! Eventually, the night sky in the window is replaced with a black star filled void, and the rattling ceases. You notice your body no longer feels so compressed.

"So how'd we do? Did we make a clean getaway?" Rita asked.

"Several government vehicles are currently surrounding the area we launched from, and there's no doubt that they saw us leave." Tammy reported, "Our stealth technology is advanced, but they found us because they know how to detect us now. We may not ever be able to go back without risk of detection upon entering the earths gravitational field."

"Well I guess it doesn't matter, we won't be coming back here anyway" Rita sighed, "What about the ship? How is she doing, did that last minute takeoff damage anything?"

"We burned out a couple of relays but nothing more, they're an easy fix" Riley replied as she confidently cracked her fingers, "I can repair them when we land."

"Good," Rita nodded, "And how's our passenger?"

Tammy looked down at you, you're face was blank. You were coming to grips with the fact that you were never going to see Earth ever again. Tammy waved a paw in front of your face to get your attention, when you seemed to come back to life she unbuckled you and slid you off of her lap.

"Are you okay?" She asked as she tilted her head.

"Yeah, I'm just thinking... I'm never going to get to go back ever again..." You replied. Just then she slowly stood up, forcing you to slide off of her lap and stand on your own two feet.

"I know it's a lot to take in..." Tammy admitted. Before she could say anymore Riley walked over with a grin.

"Let's take your mind off of it, how about I take you..."

         "And it'd be even worse if someone else took you," Tammy added.

         You hadn't really thought of that. If you got separated from the girls, you might find yourself stuck with someone far less hospitable. "Okay, so what are the rules?" You ask.

         Rita clears her throat, "First of all, don't ever wander off on your own. You need to be with one of us at all times." Okay that's reasonable, I mean.... If you were in another country with a tour guide you wouldn't want to stray to far from the group right? "Rule number two," Rita continued holding up two digits for emphasis, "Don't take anything from anyone without our consent, I think that's pretty self explanatory." You nod, there's literally a whole list of reasons for that one.

         "Three," Tammy interjected, "Don't ever leave the ship without one of us... period."

         Rita nodded, "That goes more with number one though. So, you got all that?" She asks as she turns to you and awaits your answer.

         You nod, "Shouldn't be too hard to follow."

         Rita grins and pats your head with a paw, "Excellent!" She then turns and opens a control panel before hitting a few buttons and pulling a small red handle. The door opens with a hiss as steam flows from around the doorway. The door slides up and locks itself open, allowing the four of you to exit the ship. Tammy remains behind you while Rita and Riley stay in front. You're utterly amazed by everything you see around you. Some aliens are in metallic space suits and others are in regular clothes that you'd find people wearing at the mall. Most of the alien furries you see are recognizeable, but some aren't you see one that looks like a cross between a wolf and a shark. Another one is some sort of squirrel tiger and there's a few more you can't even identify. You suddenly feel a paw on the side of your arm tugging you in another direction. You look up to find that your group had actually made a slight turn and had you kept going you might've strayed away from them.

         "What did we just tell you about wandering off?" Tammy asked as she removed her paw from your arm. You sigh and mutter an apology under your breath. "I know there's a lot to see, especially since you've never seen any of it before. But, its important that you pay attention to where we are and where you are."

         "I will," You mutter. She's talking to you sternly, but you can tell by the hint of mirth in her voice and her expression that she finds this amusing. Frankly you're embarrassed about the whole thing. You feel like a child with his mother in the grocery store... though... it's kind of nice to have a mother-like figure in your life after going so long without any parents. Although, you won't admit that to any of them. With your little episode out of the way the four of you continue to walk until...
1353322211.title: Tammy to the airlock

choices: They actually take their shipment and leave without incedent
They try to take the shipment AND kidnap you while they're at it
13533222111.content:
As you and the girls continue walking around the station, you find that Rita and Riley start headed pointedly for what looks like a blue saber tooth tiger anthro. She's about Rita's height, maybe an inch or so taller. She has long blue hair that matches her fur and striking gold eyes. In her fur you see a pattern of dark blue stripes while the rest of her fur is a lighter shade of ocean blue. She's dressed in grey jumpsuit that you might find on a mechanic. On top of her head she wears a pair of goggles and in one of her back pockets you notice a pair of work gloves hanging out. "Definitely the mechanic..." you thought as your group approached her.

         "Hey Sadie," Rita casually called.

         Sadie glanced over in your direction and waved at your group, "Hey guys! Just finishing up here! You can stick around if ya want, shouldn't take more than a minute or two."

         Rita and Riley continue walking towards Sadie, but you slow your pace as you notice that she's closing the deal with what seems to be a pair of geckos. Your not sure why but they give you an uneasy feeling. Both are covered in forest green scales and stand a little shorter than Rita. They are each dressed in some sort of high tech space suits with helmets hanging off of the neck collar just behind their heads. One is male, while the other is clearly female. The shape of their bodies makes it pretty easy for you to tell which is which. The female also seems to have red eyes while the male's eyes are orange. You honestly have no desire to go anywhere near them but Tammy pushes you along from behind.

         Once you're within earshot, you can hear Sadie trying to squeeze a little more money out of the two reptiles. "Are ya sure I can't interest you in some spare parts to go along with these navigation computers? They could come in handy."

         The male lizard held a palm up and shook his head, "That's very kind of you to offer but I don't think we have any need for them..."

         As you walk up behind Rita, Riley and Sadie the female gecko seems to take notice of you and before you know it she's standing next to you after darting between the three felines that were standing in front of you with frightening agility, "But perhaps you could tell us more about this... interesting creature..." She suggest coolly.

         You shiver as she cups your chin in her cold, gloved palm and turns your face this way and that. It only takes a moment for the girls to register what's happened. Tammy is the first to act as she yanks you away from the gecko woman's grasp, "Claws off our human!" She growls.

         The gecko woman puts her hands up in a surrendering fashion, "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to offend. But perhaps you'd be willing to part with this... human? Was it? For the right price."

         Tammy pulls you closer to her so that your body is compressed between her arms and her stomach while she growls at the lizard, "He's not for sale."

         The male gecko then approaches Tammy from the side before stopping a few feet away from her, "He does seem like an interesting specimen. We' be willing to compensate you generously in exchange for handing him over to us for study."

         Riley then stepped between the lizard and Tammy, "My friend said he's not for sale. And he's not a 'specimen', he's a member of our crew."

         "This creature is a member of your crew?" The gecko asked in disbelief, "What role does he play?"

         "That's none of your business," Rita interjected, "You bought our shipment didn't you?"

         "That we did," The lizard replied.

         "Then take what you came for and go," Rita snapped.

         "I think we'll do just that," The female gecko replied.
13533222111.title: You come across a blue sabertooth anthro talkin...

choices: Sadie!
One of the Geckos!
135332221112.content:
The female gecko nodded at the male who reached into some sort of pouch strapped to his waist. The agreement was for five thousand credits, yes?" He asked as he rummaged through the pouch.

         "That's right," Sadie replied.

         "Well, here you are then," The gecko smiled as he handed Sadie a silver card that looked identical to a credit card on Earth, only there was no company or card number on it.

         Sadie took the card before pulling some kind of terminal out from one of the cargo pockets on her jumpsuit. It looked like a barcode scanner that store employees used at the check out counter, except it had more buttons on it and a display screen built into it. Sadie scanned the card before hitting a few buttons on the scanner. "Hey!" She snapped, "What are you trying to pull This is only four thousand credits!"

         "Ah! Of course. My... apologies..." The gecko replied as he reached behind his back to draw out what presumably were the remaining credits. "Here we are, the rest of these should cover our remaining expenses". As Sadie reached out to accept the new card, her attention was drawn to faint clanking sound. A small silver disk landed near her feet just as she took the card from the gecko. You heard a sharp gasp from Tammy before you felt her shift so that you were facing away from the strange disk.

         Before you could ask what was happening you were briefly blinded by a bright flash and your hearing plagued by an annoying ringing noise, "A flash bang?" You gasped. Still disoriented from the initial detonation, you are vaguely aware of a struggle behind you before you feel someone grasping your arm and dragging you off. Your vision starts to return to you get a clear view of who has your arm and its...
135332221112.title: They try to take the shipment AND kidnap you wh...

choices: Sadie is contacted by the others
The lizards show up looking for you
1353322211121.content:
As your visions fades from a hazy after image back into real time, you find that Sadie has you by the arm and is dragging you to saftey. She rushes down a wide but crowded corridor and into what looks to be a maintenance access point. It was like a side alley on the side of street back on earth. Thick white steam flowed around the two of you as Sadie pushed you between a cluster of pipes that seemed to be carrying some kind of coolant. Once you were out of sight from the street Sadie knelt down to inspect you. She extended here index claw and moved it horizontally in front of your eyes before moving it vertically. Her eyes seemed to bore into you as she stared at you intently. Her amythest coloired eyes and slit pupils made you a little uncomfortable.

         At length at stood up and placed her hands on her hips. "Well your vision seems to have returned to normal..." She then reached over and snapped her fingers beside each of your ears causing you to shy away from the seemingly loud noise. "And you can hear clearly again as well... I dont think any permanent damage was done so we shouldn't have to worry too much."

         You were kind of surprised that Sadie was showing this much concern for you even though you haven't even said a word to her. You haven't even met her yet... not officially least. At any rate you decide giving an affirming answer and introduction would be the appropriate course of action, "I feel alright... thank you for helping me, I'm Kyle. It's nice to meet you Sadie."

         Sadie's pupils changed back into a round shape as she gave a friendly smile. "It's nice to finally see you in person."

         "Finally?" You ask confused as to how She seems to have been waiting to meet you.

         Sadie nodded and chuckled, "Yes, the others have been giving me updates and reports for a few days now. Your name, has appeared quite a few times in those reports."

         You look away feeling slightly embarrassed, you feel like a kid in school who got caught daydreaming by the teacher. "I see..." you sheepishlee muttered.

         "It's nothing to be embarrassed About! Take it as a compliment!" Sadie assured you as she placed a hand firmly on your shoulder.
1353322211121.title: Sadie!

choices: You meet up with the others but the Naurians are coming for you!
You spot a Naurian following you in the crowd
13533222111211.content:
Before either one of you could continue your conversation, you were interrupted by a loud beeping sound. Sadie looked down at her wrist to find her watch flashing green.

         "What's that?" You asked.

         "It's my wristcom, the others are trying to contact us," Sadie bright her wrist up to her face before talking into it, "Sadie here."

         "Good, you're ok!" You recognized the voice as Riley's, "You weren't here after the fighting ended, I was afraid they'd taken you hostage. On that note we can't find Kyle anywhere, is he with you?"

         "Yeah, I've got him. I dragged him out of there because I was worried that thjose shifty Naurians were gonna grab him. We're laying low in a maintenance alcove right now."

         Can you make it back to the ship? Is docked at bay eleven..."

         Sadie sighed in frustration, "That's a fair distance from us.... but we can't stay here forever. Those Naurians are probably trying to track us down as we speak."

         Rita just made it back to the ship, she's preparing it for departure, Tammy and I will meet you in the commons and escort you back to the ship."

         Sadie nodded, "Alright, see you soon." She then pushed a button on her wristcom and it went silent. "Alright, let's get a move on. Stay close to me." You nodded and followed close behind Sadie as she moved back into the general crowd.
13533222111211.title: Sadie is contacted by the others

choices: You're fine. But you'll be hurting for a while
You collapse back onto the ground, definitely not okay
13533222111212.content:
Sadie's smile suddenly disappeared and her pupils went from founded to slit as she pushed you away and leapt backwards to avoid a narrow beam of lightening that whizzed by. It definitely would've hit one of you had she not acted. Speaking of which, no sooner than she hit the ground did your protector draw a weapon of her own. It was a gun resembling a brass knuckle with a small barrel just above the index finger. Sadie fired two small orbs of brilliant white light. The first hit it's target; the male lizard who had fired the beam from earlier. When the on impacted his chest white arcs of lightening engulfed his body rendering him motionless for a moment before they dissappeared and allowed him to collapse.

         The second shot however, had missed it's target. The female lizard avoided it by sliding under it in a way only a lizard could before proceeding to jump on Sadie. She first wrestled the gun for Sadie's grip and turned it on her. But Sadie reacted quickly and slammed the goggles on top of her head into the lizard woman's snout, causing her to keep back and afford Sadie the opportunity to slap the sidearm out of her hand. The weapon slid across the floor before hitting a wall that was a few feet away. Sadie extended her claws and slashed them across her opponent's face causing her to completely jump off and away from Sadie as she clutched her face.

         The lizard woman looked at the blood on the glove of her suit before sneering at Sadie who was now on her feet and barring her fangs with her claws deployed. "First, I'll leave you in pieces... and then I'll take the human right from in front of your mangled body...," She coldly declared.

         "Well," Sadie smirked, "You're certainly welcome to try."

         Infuriated, the lizard charged the cat. Sadie Easley sidestepped the initial attack and followed up with a punch to the lizards gut. Though she reeled, the lizard maintained her footing and threw herself into Sadie and pinned her to a wall before firing punches like her first were pistons. Left, right, left, right, her fists continuously pounded into the cat who had managed to get her arms up to protect herself, but she was still taking a beating.

         "I've got to do something..." You muttered. Looking around you found a large metal pipe near your foot.
